== Bengre (603821) ==
      
Bengre is a village in the [[Bhatkal ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1304.45 hectares and harbouring 1795 households with total population of 8429 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[BHATKAL]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 4253 and female population is 4176. Scheduled Caste Population is 1109 and Scheduled Tribes population is 180. Census Location Code of the village is 603821<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
